categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Operation Joystick was a mission carried out by the New Republic Intelligence Service to gather information regarding a recently rediscovered Adumar.

They sent Tomer Darpen, under the codename NRI1, to investigate and survey the local culture. Darpen gave a detailed report about the planet's lack of planetary government and their different customs. It was also when he requested for famous pilots to be sent as ambassadors while he remained on the world for further preparations.
